name: Arachne

screenshots.caption: arachne-driven test of a generalized parser for function definition<->calls tied to project source files

short_description: This is dedicated to development of a small class for organizing data in both a traditional parent<->child hierarchy and by the functions used to generate child data nodes from parent data.  The core of the project is in the class definitions contained within arachne.py, a demonstration of how this method of arranging data can be used to solve a relatively interesting problem may be found in test.py
summary: Exploration of a Hierarchical+Functional Approach To Data Organization
